column.name: METRIC_TYPE
column.description: 0: not executed, 1: executed in central, 2: executed in local, 3: executed both in central & local

column.name: METRIC_GROUP
column.description: 0: standard, 1: diagnostic summary, 2: diagnostic detail, 3: folder, 4: category, 5: distribution, 6: user metric, 7: APM Summary, 8: Diag Aggregate, 9999: internal

column.name: METRIC_DEPENDS_ON
column.description: List of metrics whose results are needed to compute this one (comma separated list of metric IDs).

column.name: METRIC_OPTIONS
column.description: flag for XXL diags, or eventually other meaning

column.name: SCOPE_ID
column.description: When non zero, the scope dataset id

column.name: PROPERTY_ID
column.description: When non zero, the property id used to filter scope

column.name: METRIC_INDEX
column.description: Default Execution order. if the metric are independant, all values can be set to 1.

column.name: AGGREGATE_WEIGHT
column.description: Weight of the current metric in order to compute the parent value.

column.name: METRIC_SCOPE_PROCEDURE_NAME
column.description: Scope procedure executed for the current (METRIC_PARENT_ID, METRIC_ID)

column.name: METRIC_SCOPE_PROCEDURE_NAME_2
column.description: Scope procedure executed for the current (METRIC_PARENT_ID, METRIC_ID)

column.name: METRIC_CRITICAL
column.description: 1 when metric is a critical contribution for its parent
